Weapons -- Female Human Seasoned Fighter

Agility: d6 Smarts: d6 Spirit: d4 Strength: d10 Vigor: d10
Attribute Notes:
Adaptability: +1 Attribute Points
Brawny: +1 Strength step (encumbrance and minimum strength requirements)
Armor Restriction: -4 Agility w/heavy armor or shield
Skills (14 Points):
Athletics: (agi) d8 Notice: (sma) d4 Shooting: (agi) d8
Common Knowledge: (sma) d4 Persuasion: (spi) d4 Stealth: (agi) d4
Fighting: (agi) d6 Riding: (agi) d4 Thievery: (agi) d4
Languages: Abyssal; Common; Dwarven; Ignan
Skill Notes:
Mild Mannered: -2 Intimidation
Armor Restriction: -4 Agility-based skills w/heavy armor or shield
Attractive: +1 Performance (attracted target)/+1 Persuasion (attracted target)
Hard Of Hearing: -4 Notice (hearing)
Size: 1 Alignment: Neutral Deity: Cayden Cailean (Good)
Advances: 4 Improvement Points: 12 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 4; Edge: 6; Skill: 2
Description Notes: Brawny: +1 Size
Features
Edges (5 points): Attractive; Barbarian; Brawny; Fighter; Nerves Of Steel Hindrances: Big Mouth; Hard Of Hearing; Mild Mannered; Suspicious Human Features: Adaptability
Feature Notes:
Adaptability: +1 Edge Points
Barbarian: Has Armor Restriction, Fast, and Rage features
Fighter: Has Martial Flexibility feature
Big Mouth: Cannot keep secrets
Enraged: Ignores 2 points of wound penalties and all fatigue penalties
Suspicious: Trusts no one
Combat
Parry: 7 (2) Cover: -2 Toughness: 10 (2) Pace/Run: 8/+d6
Armor: Leather Jacket Shield: Medium Weapons: Bastard Sword (d10+d8); Battle Axe (d10+d8); Blowgun (d4-2 R3"); Bolas (d10+d4 R3"); Composite Bow (d10+d6 R12"); Dagger (d10+d4 R3"); Falchion (d10+d8); Flail (d10+d6); Glaive (d10+d8); Great Axe (d10+d10); Great Sword (d10+d10); Guisarme (d10+d6); Halberd (d10+d8); Hand Axe (d10+d6 R3"); Hand Crossbow (2d4 R5"); Hand Repeating Crossbow (2d4 R5"); Heavy Club (d10+d6); Heavy Crossbow (2d8 R15"); Heavy Flail (d10+d8); Heavy Mace (d10+d8); Heavy Repeating Crossbow (2d8 R15"); Javelin (d10+d6 R4"); Katana (d10+d6+1); Knife (d10+d4 R3"); Lance (d10+d8); Light Club (d10+d4); Light Crossbow (2d6 R10"); Light Mace (d10+d6); Light Repeating Crossbow (2d6 R10"); Long Bow (2d6 R15"); Long Sword (d10+d8); Maul (d10+d10); Morningstar (d10+d6); Net (d0 R3"); Pike (d10+d8); Quarterstaff (d10+d4); Ranseur (d10+d6); Rapier (d10+d4); Sap (d10+d4); Scimitar (d10+d6); Scythe (d10+d6); Short Bow (2d6 R12"); Short Spear (d10+d6 R4"); Short Sword (d10+d6); Shuriken (d10+d4 R3"); Sickle (d10+d4); Sling (d10+d4 R4"); Spear (d10+d6 R3"); Spiked Chain (d10+d6); Staff (d10+d4); Starknife (d10+d4 R3"); Trident (d10+d6 R3"); Unarmed (d10+d0); Warhammer (d10+d6); Whip (d10+d4)
Combat Notes:
Brawny: +1 Toughness
Fast: +2 Pace
Fighting Parry Modifier: +3 Parry
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +5
Fury: +1 Strength step; every attack must be a Wild Attack
Great Axe Parry Modifier: -1 Parry when wielded
Martial Flexibility: May gain benefits of combat edge for 5 rd 1/encounter
Nerves Of Steel: Ignores 1 points of wound penalties
Quarterstaff Parry Modifier: +1 Parry when wielded
Rage: Has Fury, Enraged, and Reckless Abandon features for 5 rd at will or when Shaken or wounded (Smarts neg); suffers 1 level of fatigue afterward until 1 hr rest
Rapier Parry Modifier: +1 Parry when wielded
Reckless Abandon: Critical failure on attack hits random target or self
Staff Parry Modifier: +1 Parry when wielded
Starknife Parry Modifier: +1 Parry when wielded
Whip Parry Modifier: -1 Parry when wielded
